events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer role and will begin review shortly.
The application was categorised under the engineering cluster based on keywords such as software and engineer.
A recruiter has been assigned to guide the candidate through the technical interview and hiring process.
The candidate successfully completed the initial screening, demonstrating strong software development knowledge.
The candidate responded promptly and expressed enthusiasm about the upcoming technical interview.
The technical interview has been scheduled for May 5th at 10 AM to evaluate software development skills.
The candidate completed the technical interview and showed excellent proficiency in coding and problem-solving.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss cultural fit and employment terms with the candidate.
The HR interview was completed successfully, and the candidate reaffirmed strong interest in the role.
A formal job offer was proposed to the candidate with competitive compensation and benefits package.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and requested minor clarifications on the benefits.
The candidate officially accepted the job offer and confirmed the joining date for onboarding.
Onboarding activities have commenced to integrate the new software engineer into the development team.
The hiring process is now closed successfully with the candidate fully onboarded and productive.
